item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-26
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Bacco. #
  • Bova's @ North End #
  • Bacco menu @ North End #
  • Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc @ Bacco #
  • Who runs out of dessert @ an italian restaurant? Looks we'll be hunting down some pastry @ coffee somewhere else in the N End. #
  • I'm at Cambridge Brewing Company (1 Kendall Square, Cambridge). #
  • I'm at whole foods market-river street (340 river street, cambridge). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
